item_desc1EN.	\t\tA small white mineral that emits light. Appraised as a beautiful pearlescent stone, it is an elliptical, almost spheroid shape that has formed over many months and years.\n#~Vernis Mineralogical Field Guide~\n

item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tWhite-colored ore.
item_desc1EN.	\t\tA small white mineral that emits light. Appraised as a beautiful pearlescent stone, it is an elliptical, almost spheroid shape that has formed over many months and years.\n#~Vernis Mineralogical Field Guide~\n
